books.name: The Selfish Gene
books.description: Richard Dawkins explores the gene-centered view of evolution and the role of genes in shaping behavior.

books.name: The Structure of Scientific Revolutions
books.description: Thomas S. Kuhn introduces the concept of paradigm shifts and challenges traditional views of scientific progress.

books.name: A Brief History of Time
books.description: Stephen Hawking provides an accessible overview of cosmology, the Big Bang, black holes, and the nature of time.

books.name: The Elegant Universe
books.description: Brian Greene explores string theory, the quest for a unified theory of physics, and the nature of the universe.

books.name: The Double Helix
books.description: James D. Watson recounts the discovery of the structure of DNA and the race to unlock the secrets of life.

books.name: The Feynman Lectures on Physics
books.description: Richard P. Feynman delivers a comprehensive introduction to physics, covering a wide range of topics.
